description: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1)=1; thereafter, if n is k-th number whose greatest prime factor has an odd index [i.e., n = A244991(k)], a(n) = A026424(a(k)), otherwise, when n is k-th number whose greatest prime factor has an even index [i.e., n = A244990(1+k)], a(n) = A028260(1+a(k)).
